item.description:
We'll be meeting the at the Marlborough Public Library in the Story Hour Room downstairs near the Children's Library. Here's the plan for the next meeting:

6:30 - 7:00 Introductions, Resources, Announcements (including yours)
7:00 - 7:30 No speaker yet. Come ready to tell your procrastination stories and maybe find a buddy.
7:30 - 8:15 Questions, Answers, Comments, Networking

After the meeting, members can regroup at a nearby restaurant/pub (5-min walk) to continue the conversation.

Please RSVP so we can have some idea of how many handouts and chairs are needed.

Hope to see you there! -Alice
item.name: Metrowest Procrastinators June 2010 Meeting
